Text: Could you please seed this torrent again? i really want this. When I have downloaded it I´ll seed it for at least a year, that´s a promise.

Thankyou Empty door. A very interesting and important documentary. I´m working on giving it english subtitles and in a week or maybe two I will upload it to PB with english subs so that it can reach more people. I´ll continue to seed this version as well. 
It just takes a heck of a lot of time to do the subs in Premiere, especially since my computer really is the slowest on this planet.
Thanks for sharing!
